  • Data: Observations
    • Global mean temperature data used in the AR4 assessment report;
    • High resolution climatology prepared by the Climatic Research Unit (CRU) of the University of East Anglia (UEA).
    • Previous version of CRU data preserved for reference.
    • Carbon Dioxide: observed atmospheric concentrations
    • Socio-Economic Baseline Dataset
    • IPCC AR4 Observed Climate Change Impacts
    • Environmental Data and Scenarios
  • Data: Simulations
    • Emissions scenarios (from Integrated Assessment Models):
      • SRES Emissions scenarios used in TAR and AR4
      • IS92 Emissions scenarios user in SAR
    • Global climate model output: monthly means
      • Results from GCM-Runs for the Fourth Assessment Report (AR4) based on the IPCC-SRES scenarios*
      • Results from GCM-Runs for the Third Assessment Report (TAR) based on the IPCC-SRES scenarios
      • Results from GCM-Runs based on the IPCC-IS92a (or similar) emission scenarios
      • Results from GCM-Runs user in the First Assessment Report (FAR) (subset)
    • Global climate model output: period-averages
      • Model output described in the 2007 IPCC Fourth Assessment Report (SRES scenarios)
      • Model output described in the 2001 IPCC Third Assessment Report* (SRES scenarios)
      • Model output described in the 1995 IPCC Second Assessment Report* (IS92 scenarios)
    • Global climate model output: global-means (AR4)
  • Data: Synthesis
